item.title: A simple ggplot of some measure against depth
item.description: set up The goal is to plot the measure of something, say O2 levels, against depth (soil or lake), with the measures taken on multiple days library(ggplot2) library(data.table) First â€“ create fake data depths <- c(0, seq(10,100, by=10)) dates <- c("Jan-18", "Mar-18", "May-18", "Jul-18") x <- expand.grid(date=dates, depth=depths) n <- nrow(x) head(x) ## date depth ## 1 Jan-18 0 ## 2 Mar-18 0 ## 3 May-18 0 ## 4 Jul-18 0 ## 5 Jan-18 10 ## 6 Mar-18 10 X <- model.
